meanings.definition: The quality of being apparent or evident.
meanings.sent1: The apparentnesses of the stars in the night sky amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: The apparentnesses of the road signs made navigation simple.
meanings.sent3: The apparentnesses of the clown's red nose brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The apparentnesses of the truth shone through his words like a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The apparentnesses of the danger ahead urged them to turn back immediately.

meanings.definition: The state of being easily seen or understood.
meanings.sent1: The apparentnesses of her joy were evident in her wide smile.
meanings.sent2: The apparentnesses of the instructions made the task straightforward.
meanings.sent3: The apparentnesses of the cat's attempt to hide under the table was comical.
meanings.sent4: The apparentnesses of the storm approaching sent shivers down their spines.
meanings.sent5: The apparentnesses of his guilt were written all over his face.
